channel.title: Tribal Isles server
channel.description:
[right][left][b][size=14pt][u]Tribal Isles - A slightly new experience[/u][/size][/b]
Hello, I recently decided to design a private server that is sort of different to others, it being different is referring to the features and the flow of the server. It is targetted at quite a young age, around 12+, as it is appealing to a young nature in my opinion, however it will still be enjoyed by all. I am currently not making a development team, as I have asked personal friends to help me out with this.
Note that once we finish the source completely with devolution, we will be hosting it but then start working on an 'Elite' version of the source, using a more stable source, which is also to be decided as another one may arrive in the downloads section whilst we are in development.
[b][u][size=12pt]The server concept[/size][/u][/b]
We will be splitting the server up into two different sides, or tribes as we call them, these tribes are called the 'Matee Tribe' and the 'Natoo tribe'. The idea of this is we will be basing them off different natures such as combat and skilling, etc. The tribes will both be based on two different islands, The matee tribe shall be on Karamja whilst the Natoo tribe shall be on Ape Atoll. Upon first join of the server, you pick your tribe.
Within these tribal islands, the players will have their own little tasks to do, or else they may decide to do their own things. The tasks are basically small quests which they will complete for their tribal elders, and there for earning rewards once done. You may also go to the local training area, which will include NPC's, training dummy's and target practise for archers. There will also be 'Mini-games', these will be something along the concept of clan wars, except it will be in a custom area. This will be basically tribe against tribe, a reward is yet to be worked out. There will be other mini-games to come.
There will be one random place on the mainland where the two tribes may come to trade eachother, shop for items and also have a go at 'Pk'ing', or fighting, etc. There will also be local shops on the island.
There is a lot more but I don't want to get a tl;dr on my thread. ;)
Now I'll move onto the pictures, although I don't have many, I'll upload more tomorrow or whenever more development is done.
The two npc's at the very start, here you choose which tribe you want to join: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30cps1u.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/uucm1.jpg[/img]
The current Natoo tribe island layout (not updated):
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/hv5mki.png[/img]
Red dot = Main Natoo village. Pink dot: undecided area, possibly a new quest, training area or agility course. Blue dot: Main training area, for training on NPC's. there will be randoms in this area also. Black dots: This will be where the quests shall be, and also mini-quests.
[u]To do list:[/u] [*]Make a base for mini-games & improve their current design. [*]Create supportive NPC's [*]Staff system (Will include easier moderating methods, still deciding on how this will be done though) [*]Create a base for mini-quests. [*]Create seperate dialogue files for the speach [*]Add positive XP rates, they will not be like RuneScapes, but it won't be around 10 clicks to 99 either.
[u]Complete:[/u] [*]Create the proposed training areas.. [*]Create Natoo personal training area [*]Add the NPC drops appropiatly.
[b]My team:[/b] Tom (Tomscape BETA) Adam (Scape-JAVA) Conor (The Soul)[/left][/right]

zyle1992:

Just one small content thing, in the picture where you choose your tribe, it would look cleaner if you made it just one option instead of 2 options, with one blank one. I don’t know if you changed that after you posted the pic, but i just thought i’d point that out.

Mm thanks for the pointer, we were trying something out when I had took the picture so it was appearing like that, I’ll be using one option though.
